name: Catatonic Hero
description:
You're a cat, and you have to save the world!

A dimension with a singular clock is in danger of a nuclear holocaust! Save them by rewinding the only clock to stall for time as you fly through the world with your cat-like abilities.

You can do it! Go save the world! 

By the way, you don't actually get a jacket until the end.

Controls: 

-[<] [>] or [A] [D] to move horizontally.

-[SPACE] to jump, you can also jump once in the air.

Don't let the clock reach 0, you'll die. That's a mission failed.

!! DO THESE AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION !!

To reset your progress, go to the home screen and hold:

[Left Control] [Left Shift] [R] [Backspace]

To enter the command console, hold:

[Left Control] [Left Shift] [L] [Backspace]

The order in which you type them matters. Also, the development console might not be the most functional.
